title: Examining the potential of peppermint essential oil-infused pectin and kappa-carrageenan composite films for sustainable food packaging
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Saurabh Bhatia, Aysha Salim Alhadhrami, Yasir Abbas Shah, Tuba Esatbeyoglu, Esra Koca, Levent Yurdaer Aydemir, Ahmed Al-Harrasi, Syam Mohan, Asim Najmi, Asaad Khalid
